poll_list.title: Claim GTC by ETH address without logging in github.
poll_list.body:
There are many support tickets on github.com for account suspended issues.Github.com is centralized and controlled by Microsoft. It goes against the decentralized rules of crypto world.
The suggestion here is to make the GTC airdrops claimable by ETH addresses without logging in with github.com accounts.
poll_list.author: 0xdaFa879f659Bba79011130cfA6537Ab3E1ABdD97
